text: The discography of Lloyd Banks, an American hip hop recording artist, consists of three studio albums, eleven singles and one soundtrack. His music has been released on the record labels G-Unit Records and EMI, along with subsidiaries Aftermath Entertainment and Shady Records. == Albums == === Studio albums === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of albums, with selected chart positions, sales figures and certifications !
